normalized: marika was undoubtedly getting in my way, however, if i played my hand unwisely and she figured out what i was up to with cara, then my plan would come to nothing.
moreover, there wasn't even a guarantee that i would be able to survive, if that did come to pass.
i had been left with no choice but to continue cara's training while avoiding marika.
the time of humans came to an end, as the night descended.
it was our time now.
marika's class was about to end soon.
however, i had entrusted her to azuma.
she was going to lure her towards kitae, immediately after her class would end.
i had been informed that cara had finished her work as well, and was heading back to the dormitory now.
as a result, i had decided to go ahead with my plan.

name: yamakawa
normalized: ah!
professor cara.
as soon as i noticed cara, i pretended to have come across her unexpectedly.

name: cara
normalized: oh!
i appreciate your efforts for the day.

name: yamakawa
normalized: i appreciate your efforts as well.
are you heading back right now?

name: cara
normalized: yes, that's right.
you will still be here for a while though, won't you?

name: yamakawa
normalized: indeed, i will be.
after all, i have to work on your training now!
as soon as i activated the bug, the queen leapt up with a start before hugging her trembling body, as if to shield herself.

name: cara
normalized: hah!?
gufuuh…!?
is it… you…!?

name: gram
normalized: yes.
it is me.
it seemed like she had figured out that there was something suspicious about me.

name: gram
normalized: i am going to thoroughly enjoy your pointless struggling, while it lasts.

name: cara
normalized: that is… your style, isn't it?

name: gram
normalized: indeed, it is.
feel free to continue your struggling, while i──
i wasn't sure who or what had attacked me, however, it felt like i was about to crash against the ceiling.

name: gram
normalized: what… the…?
my torso slumped over to the floor,
with a crimson-coloured fluid streaming out of my neck with sloshing sounds.
the rattling sound of an engine revving up echoed throughout the corridor.

name: marika
normalized: how dare you… to miss cara!

name: gram
normalized: marika…?
but… how…!?

name: marika
normalized: i gave that human the slip.

had this assassin… who possessed the ability to move around instantaneously… at a speed which was much faster than your average human's speed… used it to give azuma the slip… before rushing to this place…?

name: marika
normalized: i was too late.
please remain calm.

name: cara
normalized: come back to me… later.
deal him the finishing blow… first and foremost!

name: marika
normalized: yes.
the knight thrust her serpentine eyes wide open.
and then, a streak of her ominously shining after-image flashed out, as she rushed in through the darkness of the night.

name: gram
normalized: kukuku… kukukuku…
she ripped my torso into tiny pieces, before chopping my head up into minced meat.
and then, she cast a spell of fire on me, causing my life to be snuffed out.
even though i had been transformed into mere lumps of meat, i raised the edges of my lips.
the negotiations between the humans and the vampires concluded without incident.
it was the first page of a new history, as a de facto harmony had been established.
one month had passed since then.

name: kitae
normalized: ufufu… professor kamimura, you too… isn't it?

name: azuma
normalized: hehe… it's not just you, director.
the best barrier-master in the entire world──
and the greatest hunter of vampires in the land──
both the beautiful women caressed their bellies lovingly, as if they were holding a precious treasure within.
